criteria.name: Clear Research Questions
criteria.description: Are the research questions explicitly stated?

criteria.name: Clear Methodology
criteria.description: Is the methodology explicitly stated? Is there a step-by-step description of the experimental design?

criteria.name: Open Data
criteria.description: Are the raw or processed datasets publicly available? If data cannot be shared, is there a clear justification (e.g., privacy concerns)?

criteria.name: Data Documentation
criteria.description: Is there a data dictionary or codebook explaining variables, formats, and preprocessing steps? Are data collection methods (e.g., surveys, sensors, LMS logs) fully described?

criteria.name: FAIR Compliance
criteria.description: Is the data Findable (DOI or persistent identifier)? Is it Accessible (open license, no paywalls)? Is it Interoperable (standardized formats like CSV, JSON)? Is it Reusable (clear licensing, metadata)?

criteria.name: Open Source Code
criteria.description: Is the analysis code (Python, R, etc.) shared in a repository (GitHub, GitLab)?

criteria.name: Code for Data preparation
criteria.description: If code is shared: Are scripts for data cleaning, analysis, and visualization included?

criteria.name: Version Control & Dependencies
criteria.description: Are software versions (e.g., Python 3.10, TensorFlow 2.12) documented?

criteria.name: Deterministic Execution
criteria.description: If randomness is involved (e.g., ML training), are random seeds fixed and reported?

criteria.name: Transparent Statistical Methods
criteria.description: Are statistical tests, models, and assumptions clearly described? Are effect sizes, confidence intervals, and p-values reported (not just significance)?

criteria.name: Alternative Implementations Tested
criteria.description: If applicable, does the study test robustness by varying methods (e.g., different ML models)?

criteria.name: Outcome Shared
criteria.description: Has the outcome of the Experiment been shared?

criteria.name: Limiations and potential biases
criteria.description: Are limitations and potential biases discussed?

criteria.name: Negative Results Reported
criteria.description: Are non-significant or contradictory findings included?
